title: What is wrong with this client!???
body: 4 times in past 2 hours i get error message and get dropped from champ select.....now im getting time dodge low rank que penalties.

replies.body:
There was a service incident last night with the NA server that began shortly after 9:00pm PDT that was causing these error messages and failure to join matches after champ select. The issue was resolved later in the evening prior to the scheduled maintenance.

If you're still experiencing this issue, please let me know.
Poodlecorp has attacked the server with a DDOS. I'd expect the servers to return when the maintenance is over at 7:00 PDT.
